organization.description:
The Cat Network, Inc. is a Florida not-for-profit corporation dedicated to humanely reducing cat overpopulation by educating the public about the need to sterilize their pets and strays; providing access to low-cost spay/neuter services for stray, homeless and abandoned cats; helping members in their efforts to place adoptable cats in loving homes; and advocating non-lethal population control and humane public policy. Join us at our monthly meetings and learn more about how you can help homeless cats.

###COL###
###MON###
organization.name: THE CAT NETWORK, INC.
